title: FS 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin Hugh Jennings, EX

posts.post_title: FS 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin Hugh Jennings, EX
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin of Hugh Jennings HOF for sale. The pin is in EX condition. No dents or scratches. No stains or rust. 

Price: $34.95 delivered.

Payment: Paypal (f/f please), check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the pin.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
